articles.title: Bone appétit: Ben & Jerry's is now making dog treats - WCVB Boston
articles.description: The ice cream-like concoctions are available in two flavors named after employees' dogs: "Pontch's Mix," which features peanut butter with pretzel swirls and "Rosie's Batch," a combination of pumpkin and mini cookies.
articles.content:
Ben & Jerry's is already irresistible to most humans and now, they're looking to hook man's best friend with a new line of dog treats.
